@kevinddaly The same in London at Her Majesty‚Äôs. It was Bugsy Malone, West Side Story and then The Scarlet Pimpernel with Donald Sinden before Phantom arrived. The only change to the marquee in our lifetimes will probably be it becoming His Majesty‚Äôs Theatre.
